static Utils-p.getNoun ( $  iNum,
$  sSingular,
$  sPlural 
) [static]

Return singular or plural version of a word, depending on number and including the number. Should move to a Language class in case of multi language project.

Parameters:
$iNum int The number.
$sSingular string The singular version of the word.
$sPlural string The plural version of the word.
Returns:
string Something like: "1 man" or "5 men".
Since:
1.0

static Utils-p.stripHtml ( $  sContent  )  [static]

This function will remove HTML tags, javascript sections and white space. Also some common HTML entities will be converted to their text equivalent.

Parameters:
$sContent string Text to be stripped.
Returns:
string Plain-text version of input.
Since:
1.0
